scripts.build-js: npm run build-js-vendor && npm run build-js-custom
scripts.build-js-vendor: mkdir -p web/static/js/vendor && cp node_modules/htmx.org/dist/htmx.min.js web/static/js/vendor/ && cp node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.min.js web/static/js/vendor/alpine.min.js && cp node_modules/sweetalert2/dist/sweetalert2.min.js web/static/js/vendor/
scripts.build-js-custom: echo 'No custom JS files to build currently'
scripts.build-assets: npm run build-css-prod && npm run build-js
